translations.ja: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: This Week In React #115: Astro, Radix, Remix, Next.js, MDX, Storybook, Expo 46, Skia, TanStack, TC39, Docusaurus...

translations.ja: This Week In React #115: Astro、Radix、Remix、Next.js、MDX、Storybook、Expo 46、Skia、TanStack、TC39、Docusaurus...

segments.source_content: <!-- truncate -->

translations.ja: @@untranslatable_placeholder_fc91ee08

segments.source_content: Hi everyone!

translations.ja: 皆さん、こんにちは！

segments.source_content: Following the successful launch of Docusaurus 2.0, I didn't have time to send out the newsletter scheduled for earlier this week 😅

translations.ja: Docusaurus 2.0の成功したローンチに続き、今週初めに予定していたニュースレターを送る時間がありませんでした😅

segments.source_content: This is another special edition, on a Friday night, covering almost 3 weeks of news, and a lot has happened!

translations.ja: これは金曜日の夜に送る特別版で、ほぼ3週間分のニュースをカバーしています。多くのことが起こりました！

segments.source_content: Impossible to read everything or comment 😬. I made the choice to be exhaustive and include all the links that seemed interesting to me, without necessarily commenting on them. I would already have to read them myself before 😅 a bit overwhelmed now.

translations.ja: すべてを読んだりコメントしたりするのは不可能です😬。私は網羅的であることを選択し、興味深いと思ったすべてのリンクを含めることにしましたが、必ずしもコメントは付けていません。まず自分で読む必要があります😅 今は少し手一杯です。

segments.source_content: During this month of August, I will focus on my Revue migration to ConvertKit. The next edition will be around August 20th, but it's also possible I skip it and won't send anything until early September.

translations.ja: 8月中は、RevueからConvertKitへの移行に集中します。次回の配信は8月20日頃を予定していますが、スキップして9月初旬まで何も送らない可能性もあります。

segments.source_content: Anyway, since we won't see each other for a while, at least you'll have something to read this summer 🤣

translations.ja: とにかく、しばらく会えない間、せめて夏の間に読むものがあるように🤣

segments.source_content: 🙏 **Support the newsletter:**

translations.ja: 🙏 **ニュースレターをサポート:**

segments.source_content:

segments.source_content: ## React

translations.ja: ## React

segments.source_content: [**Announcing Docusaurus 2.0**](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2022/08/01/announcing-docusaurus-2.0?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.ja: [**Docusaurus 2.0の発表**](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2022/08/01/announcing-docusaurus-2.0?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

segments.source_content: Docusaurus is the React framework I'm working on with Meta. We just released v2.0. Very happy with this release which has been relayed all over! 💝 Thanks so much for participating and contributing to the success! 🙏 Useful links:

translations.ja: Docusaurusは私がMetaと共に取り組んでいるReactフレームワークです。v2.0をリリースしました。このリリースは至る所で取り上げられ、とても嬉しく思っています！💝 成功に参加し、貢献してくれた皆さんに感謝します！🙏 役立つリンク:

segments.source_content:
* 📜 [Issue #114 was dedicated to the launch](https://www.getrevue.co/profile/thisweekinreact/issues/this-week-in-react-114-official-launch-of-docusaurus-2-0-1273933?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
* 🥇 [Product of the day on Product Hunt](https://www.producthunt.com/posts/docusaurus-2-0?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) 🥇🤩
* 🎨 [deployment demo on Vercel by Lee Robinson](https://twitter.com/leeerob/status/1554211061284364290?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
* 📜 [Easy documentation with Docusaurus and Nx](https://blog.nrwl.io/easy-documentation-with-docusaurus-and-nx-4b932d8ad0e4?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

* 🥇 [Product Huntで「本日のプロダクト」に選出](https://www.producthunt.com/posts/docusaurus-2-0?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) 🥇🤩

segments.source_content: G2i is the only hiring platform that puts developer health first. We connect React and React Native freelancers with great companies committed to improving developers' mental, physical, and emotional health and well-being. [Apply to join](https://welcome.g2i.co/apply?campaign=marketing-partner-newsletters\&utm_campaign=Marketing%20Partner%20Newsletters\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=TWIR) today.

translations.ja: G2iは、開発者の健康を第一に考える唯一の採用プラットフォームです。ReactおよびReact Nativeのフリーランサーを、開発者の精神的・身体的・感情的な健康と幸福を向上させることに取り組む優れた企業と結びつけます。[今すぐ参加を申し込む](https://welcome.g2i.co/apply?campaign=marketing-partner-newsletters\&utm_campaign=Marketing%20Partner%20Newsletters\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=TWIR)

segments.source_content: Gabe Greenberg, founder of G2i, has launched a fund on [**developerhealth.org**](https://developerhealth.org/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) to provide financial assistance for the dev community. Developer are welcome to apply and use the fund for counseling/therapy, paid time between freelance projects, loan assistance, child care services, medical visits and expenses, etc.

translations.ja: G2iの創設者であるGabe Greenbergは、[**developerhealth.org**](https://developerhealth.org/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)で基金を立ち上げ、開発者コミュニティへの財政的支援を提供しています。開発者は、カウンセリング/セラピー、フリーランスプロジェクト間の有給休暇、ローン支援、育児サービス、医療訪問や費用などにこの基金を利用できます。

segments.source_content: ## React-Native

translations.ja: ## React-Native

segments.source_content: [**Pedal to the Metal**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter\&v=uvLQ5f3KDXk)

translations.ja: [**Pedal to the Metal**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React\&utm_medium=email\&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter\&v=uvLQ5f3KDXk)

segments.source_content: 🤯 This video by William Candillon is my favorite! You must watch it even if it's just for the intro, and the quality of the production👌 It includes the latest news of React-Native-Skia which goes into alpha, is included in Expo Go via Expo SDK 46, supports Snack, supports the web (with a Remotion starter), not to mention the perf improvements on the reconciler... In short, it moves fast and this is very exciting! It's also a nice collaboration with Shopify, Expo, Google, Remotion...

translations.ja: 🤯 このWilliam Candillonによる動画は私のお気に入りです！イントロだけでも、そして制作のクオリティだけでも必見です👌 React-Native-Skiaの最新ニュースが含まれており、アルファ版がリリースされ、Expo SDK 46を介してExpo Goに含まれ、Snackをサポートし、Web（Remotionスターター付き）をサポートし、レコンシライアのパフォーマンス改善も見逃せません... 要するに、急速に進化しており、非常にエキサイティングです！Shopify、Expo、Google、Remotionとの素晴らしいコラボレーションでもあります。
